org.jclouds.blobstore
Interface AsyncBlobStore

All Known Implementing Classes:
AtmosAsyncBlobStore, AWSS3AsyncBlobStore, AzureAsyncBlobStore, BaseAsyncBlobStore, CloudFilesAsyncBlobStore, FilesystemAsyncBlobStore, HPCloudObjectStorageLasVegasAsyncBlobStore, S3AsyncBlobStore, SwiftAsyncBlobStore, TransientAsyncBlobStore
public interface AsyncBlobStore

Provides hooks needed to run a blob store asynchronously

See Also:
AsyncBlobStore
